رابرٹ کوچ نے 1882 میں بیکٹیریم کا انکشاف: Robert Koch bacterium discovery 1882 Robert Koch 1882 bacterium

On March 24, 1882, Robert Koch announced to the Berlin Physiological Society that he had discovered the cause of tuberculosis. Three weeks later, on April 10, he published an article entitled "The Etiology of Tuberculosis" (1).
Robert Koch bacterium discovery 1882 Robert Koch 1882 bacterium
